snippet.title: Time Crisis 1 - Stage 1
snippet.description:
Here is a very fast No Miss (No Damage) clear run of Time Crisis 1 / タイムクライシス, on the Playstation 1 version.

This is my original Time Crisis 1 run, from 2007, please enjoy! If the video quality isn't good enough, check out my newer videos for this game!

Please take a look at my channel if you want to see more of my videos!
https://gaming.youtube.com/channel/UClgHVG66YhwMA39DWj5_EBw

Other Time Crisis videos:
Time Crisis 1 (Arcade) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UPsCvo_7lHs
Time Crisis 1 (PS1) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cccjpaYc9u0
Time Crisis 1 (Special) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cemHr3WOOfU
Time Crisis Project Titan - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sEZFxuW01wY
Time Crisis 2 (Arcade) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gPo9DL73xdQ
Time Crisis 2 (PS2) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ZElqew5y1o
Time Crisis 2 (PS2 - 2 Players) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MrKakcWSp_E
Time Crisis 3 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3vRq2_ssud4
Time Crisis 4 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eYFTVAvGMe0
Crisis Zone (PS2) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=688XKeWY5r8
Razing Storm - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XPl0W63uoio

More videos:
House of the Dead 1 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q-LEL_Duh2s
House of the Dead 4 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pe_PzaW4Qck
Jurassic Park - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vh2Zpg-CN3I
Confidential Mission - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0EKx-gS-7Rw
Ghost Squad - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uXeYk6nMQh4
Virtua Cop 1 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GrJZe9iOQf8
Vampire Night - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7j8ockBiQGM
Ninja Assault - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ygBSWPnjFRU
DeadStorm Pirates - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j4FlLmvcdx4
Alien3: The Gun - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bO-oPw7ylyM
Elemental Gearbolt - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EgwANIOpXFs

Player: SMRAEDIS
Date Recorded: 24th June 2007

Time Crisis is an arcade Light Gun game which has hugely popular in 1996 when it was released. Its popularity has also brought many sequals too.

Time Crisis introduced the action pedal, which when pressed, made it so you can shoot enemies, and when released, made you dodge bullets and reload.

There is no scoring system in Time Crisis, it is just all based around completion time, though there is a skill point system.

There is a time attack mode, where you can play any one stage, and have infinite lives too, which is helpful for practicing.

There is a port of Time Crisis on the PS1, however the graphics are not as good as the arcade release, and the timing is inaccurate too, so you can't compare scores between the two versions. 
Also the PS1 port runs at 30 frames per second.

Yes, I know I didn't shoot the forklift truck on Area 1, you don't have to comment saying this!

Thanks!
-SM
